name: Hodaya Nurelyan
title: Full Stack Developer
summary: Full Stack Team Leader with over a decade of experience in software engineering.

about.p1: I'm a Full Stack Developer with over 12 years of experience in software engineering. I specialize in building robust, scalable web applications from concept to production. Skilled in both frontend and backend technologies, including React, Node.js, and Python, I'm passionate about creating clean, maintainable code and delivering high-quality solutions.

about.p2: Over the years, I've led development teams, collaborated with cross-functional stakeholders, and gained hands-on experience in system architecture, cloud deployment, and DevOps practices. I recently built a personal portfolio site to showcase my skills, projects, and passion for technology.

about.p3: I'm a strong believer in lifelong learning and enjoy mentoring junior developers. I thrive in dynamic, agile environments and love turning complex problems into intuitive, user-friendly experiences. Combining creativity with technical expertise, I'm always excited to bring ideas to life and explore new challenges.

highlights: Specialized in software engineering and AI
Led a final project using React and TensorFlow
Built full-stack apps with React, Node.js, and TypeScript
Learned advanced component architecture and state management

projects.name: AI Resume Booster
projects.description: מערכת לחיזוק קורות חיים בעזרת GPT
